Desc.entry: Community group for women who originate from India and Bangladesh. Aims to promote Bengali culture through workshops, crafts, singing, readings, story telling and creative writing. Events include celebration of Eid, Bengali New Year, Diwali Language Movement Day, International Women's Day and Tagores Birth Anniversary.

Pubs.entry: Shongoton, bilingual newsletter; Bilingual books for children and adults (Bengali-English); Leaflets

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 2nd Sun in the month at 12.30pm (please confirm beforehand)

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - COMMUNITY ORGANISATIONS
